languages.text: {n}Напомаженный грузный мужчина в расшитом камзоле заискивающе улыбается и кланяется.{/n} "Мое почтение, Ваша Светлость. Можете доверить мне любые заботы о вашем довольстве — все будет сделано в лучшем виде!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Напомаженный грузный мужчина в расшитом камзоле заискивающе улыбается и кланяется.{/n} "Мое почтение, Ваша Светлость. Можете доверить мне любые заботы о вашем довольстве — все будет сделано в лучшем виде!"

languages.text: {n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"
languages.original_text: {n}Напомаженный грузный мужчина в расшитом камзоле заискивающе улыбается и кланяется.{/n} "Мое почтение, Ваша Светлость. Можете доверить мне любые заботы о вашем довольстве — все будет сделано в лучшем виде!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

{n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

{n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

{n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

languages.text: {n}这个肥胖的男人穿着绣花外套，头发油光可鉴。他露出了谄媚的笑容，向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“这是我的荣幸，大人。您可以相信我，所有能令您感到舒适的事情，我都会以最高标准来完成！”
languages.original_text: {n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个肥胖的男人穿着绣花外套，头发油光可鉴。他露出了谄媚的笑容，向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“这是我的荣幸，大人。您可以相信我，所有能令您感到舒适的事情，我都会以最高标准来完成！”

languages.text: {n}刺繍入りのジャケットに身を包み、油にまみれた髪の小柄な男は、屈託のない笑みを浮かべてお辞儀をする。{/n}「光栄です、{mf|陛下|陛下}。この船上での快適さに関することはすべて私にお任せください。あらゆることを、最高標準で成し遂げましょうぞ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

traits.locale_text: {n}刺繍入りのジャケットに身を包み、油にまみれた髪の小柄な男は、屈託のない笑みを浮かべてお辞儀をする。{/n}「光栄です、{mf|陛下|陛下}。この船上での快適さに関することはすべて私にお任せください。あらゆることを、最高標準で成し遂げましょうぞ！」

languages.text: {n}Der untersetzte Mann mit geölter Frisur trägt eine bestickte Jacke. Er lächelt unterwürfig und verbeugt sich.{/n} "Es ist mir eine Ehre, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr könnt mir alles anvertrauen, was mit Eurem Komfort zu tun hat – alles wird höchsten Standards genügen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der untersetzte Mann mit geölter Frisur trägt eine bestickte Jacke. Er lächelt unterwürfig und verbeugt sich.{/n} "Es ist mir eine Ehre, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr könnt mir alles anvertrauen, was mit Eurem Komfort zu tun hat – alles wird höchsten Standards genügen!"

languages.text: {n}Vêtu d'une veste brodée, l'homme corpulent aux cheveux huilés sourit de manière obséquieuse et s'incline.{/n} « C'est un honneur, Votre Seigneurie. Pour tout ce qui concerne votre confort personnel, vous pouvez compter sur moi... tout sera fait dans les règles de l'art ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vêtu d'une veste brodée, l'homme corpulent aux cheveux huilés sourit de manière obséquieuse et s'incline.{/n} « C'est un honneur, Votre Seigneurie. Pour tout ce qui concerne votre confort personnel, vous pouvez compter sur moi... tout sera fait dans les règles de l'art ! »

languages.text: {n}El hombre de complexión fuerte, cabello aceitado y con una chaqueta bordada te muestra una sonrisa servil y te hace una reverencia.{/n} «Es un honor, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Puede delegar en mí todos los asuntos relacionados con su comodidad: ¡podrá disfrutar de los mejores estándares!».
languages.original_text: {n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre de complexión fuerte, cabello aceitado y con una chaqueta bordada te muestra una sonrisa servil y te hace una reverencia.{/n} «Es un honor, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Puede delegar en mí todos los asuntos relacionados con su comodidad: ¡podrá disfrutar de los mejores estándares!».

languages.text: {n}Nakışlarla işlenmiş bir ceket giyen, yağlı saçlı ve tıknaz adam, dalkavukça bir gülümsemeyle önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Onur duyarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Konforunuzla ilgili her konuda bana güvenebilirsiniz, her şey en yüksek standartlara uygun olacaktır!"
languages.original_text: {n}Dressed in an embroidered jacket, the heavyset man with oiled hair offers an obsequious smile and bows.{/n} "It is an honour, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You may trust me with all matters concerning your comfort — everything will be done to the highest standard!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nakışlarla işlenmiş bir ceket giyen, yağlı saçlı ve tıknaz adam, dalkavukça bir gülümsemeyle önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Onur duyarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Konforunuzla ilgili her konuda bana güvenebilirsiniz, her şey en yüksek standartlara uygun olacaktır!"
